parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts given value in degrees to radians. 1 radian equals 180 degrees divided by [[pi]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''rad''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - degrees 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - radians
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_radians = [[rad]] 180; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns 3.1415 ([[pi]])</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[pi]], [[deg]]
</value></part></template>
